text:
Program
What's Ahead For Higher Education?
Millicent Carey McIntosh
President of Barnard College
Presiding
FOR THE INDEPENDENT COLLEGE
Dr. Lynn White, Jr.
President of Mills College
Author of "‘Educating Our Daughters; A Challenge to Colleges”
FOR THE PUBLICLY-SUPPORTED UNIVERSITY
Dr. Lewis Webster Jones
President of Rutgers, the State University of New Jersey
Past President, Association of Land Grant Colleges and State Universities
FOR THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT
The Honorable Margaret Chase Smith
Senator from Maine
Both men and women guests are cordially invited to attend the Forum Luncheon and
Program. Registration is six dollars for the Luncheon and Program, and two dollars
for the Program only. Guests who wish to attend the Program only will be admitted
to the Tier Boxes of the Grand Ballroom at 1:45 p. m.
Proceedings of The Barnard Forum will be recorded and published in booklet form.
Your registration fee will entitle you to a copy of the Proceedings.
